venue.address_1: Corner of Route 20 and Prospect Street
venue.name: Chuck's Steakhouse

item.description: Trivia is held at Chuck's Steakhouse in Auburn every Thursday. Teams are comprised of roughly six people. An emcee reads the questions, and teams submit answers. Each answer is worth a number of points. The team with the most points wins in the end!
item.how_to_find_us: I have a meetup sign which I will bring. Also, closer to the event I will give out a cell #
item.name: trivia at chuck's
